Package xxl.core.spatial.histograms.utils

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MHistogram
    This is a simple interface for spatial histograms.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MHistograms
    This class implements spatial histograms for selectivity estimation Assumption: input data is a collection of doublePointRectangles ( DoublePointRectangle ) in unit space!
    MHistograms.AbstractSelHistogram
    Groundwork class for spatial histogram generation.
    MHistograms.MinSkewHistogram
    MinSkew Histogram basic variant
    MHistograms.MinSkewProgressiveRefinementHistogram
    MinSkew Histogram basic variant
    MHistograms.RHistogram
    Two step R-tree based histogram.
    MHistograms.RKHistHistogram
    Histogram which implements RK-Hist
    MHistograms.RTreeBasicHistogram
    This is a groundwork class for R-tree based histograms.
    MHistograms.STHistForest  
    MinSkewHist
    see: S.
    MinSkewHist.Bucket
    This static class is used minskew computation.
    PartitionerUtils
    This class contains cost function for spatial histogram computation
    PartitionerUtils.DeafultWeightedArrayProcessor
    Default generic OPT list processor.
    PartitionerUtils.RKHistMetrikProcessor  
    PartitionerUtils.SpatialSkewProcessor  
    PartitionerUtils.SSEArrayProcessor
    one dim SSE processor see Thorsten Suel et.
    PartitionerUtils.SSEWeightedArrayProcessor
    one dim SSE processor see Thorsten Suel et.
    RKhist  
    RVHistogram
    This class provides Spatial Histogram construction methods ( We refer for details to D.
    SpatialHistogramBucket
    this class represents double point rectangle with weight information is used to represent histogram bucket
    STHist  
    STHist.STHistBucket  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PartitionerUtils.ProcessorType  
    RVHistogram.HistType
    These types definitions for processing the optimal partitioning.
